question:
You recently attended a conference and you would like to give a presentation about the information you gained by attending the conference.
Write a letter to your manager asking for permission to give a presentation. In your letter:
		describe what type of presentation you have in mind
		what topics it would cover and how long it would take
		who should participate in the presentation and where should it be conducted
text: I am John. I work in the core team managed by you. Recently I was appointed to attend a conference on behalf of the company and was asked to present information after attending the conference. I need your permission to host this event because of its importance in building modern applications.

åThe topic for this presentation will be on modern databases such as SQL and NoSQL along with some pictures and statistics to corroborate. The presentation also covers the advantages and disadvantages along with examples and different use cases to solve a particular problem. It will take 2 hours from start to finish with a short 15 minutes break, and at the end followed by Question & Answers.

Information presented will help everyone in the organization to gain knowledge of modern technology. Mostly it will help teams working in this particular field and manager. Interested people can also attend as it enhances team technology stack to fasten up the tasks and reduce the overall cost of developing and maintaining. Could you please arrange the conference hall for the upcoming week.
I am looking forward to hearing from you.

error_list.error_des: It seems that preposition use may be incorrect here.
It seems that manager may not agree in number with other words in this phrase.
Consider using a question mark to signify that this sentence is a question.
